Reviews.Title: Great battery and package
Reviews.Author: Kelpie
Reviews.Content: This back-up battery is better than the manufacturers, and the extra filters really came in handy for the UV lens to protect my camera lens..an appreciated bonus!

ProductInfo.Features:
LP-E12 Rechargeable Lithium Ion Replacement Battery
Battery meets or exceeds the original equipment manufacturers specifications
This Replacement Battery is 100% compatible with the Canon LP-E12 battery
3 Piece Filter Kit Includes: UV, FLD, CPL
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 18 MP CMOS DSLR Camera LP-E12 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery 2200 mAh + 3 Piece Filter Kit Bundle DavisMAX SL1 Accessory Kit
